rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a small reception area aligned to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Open Scandinavian-style living space integrating natural light and minimalist aesthetics. Includes sofa area, dining table zone near windows on the east.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances, designed for efficient workflow. Adjacent to living area and aligning with Vastu's south-eastern direction.
Well-equipped private gym with fitness equipment arranged for optimal usage and ventilation; placed near north-east as per Vastu to promote energy and strength.
Scandinavian duplex studio with open plan layout for living, dining, and kitchen areas; designed for flexible use. Vastu compliance ensured by proper directional placement.
Well-lit bathroom with fixtures aligned to ensure smooth energy flow and privacy according to local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading into the villa.
Large windows to maximize natural light.
Two-car garage door for private car access.

rooms.description: Cozy master bedroom with Scandinavian design elements ensuring natural light from east facing windows. Vastu-aligned for restful sleep.
Dedicated study space with ample storage and access to north-facing window.
Private bathroom adjacent to master bedroom for convenience, designed per local standards.

openings.description: Elegant staircase connecting ground and first floors.

additional_features.design_style: Scandinavian duplex studio apartment villa with modern touches
